summary: Drains 2 Stamina a second while sneaking.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Mod Overview:[/u]

Okay so I could not find a simple mod that makes sneaking a little less OP. So I slammed this together real quick for you guys and my self to use.
  when you make a new character you are given a perk that drains 2 stamina a second while you are sneaking. Simple right? enjoy. Oh. and if you want to 
 add this to a character you already have simply open up the console and type '  Help "Drain Stamina"  ' and its the spell listed there, so just type it in like well
you know,  '  player.addspell (in game ID) '   and you'll get the spell.



[b][u]Requirements:

[/u][/b]   Uh... None that I can think of. unless you want me to say you should start a new character or what ever or use the console to add the spell to your current toon.




[b][u]WHY IS THIS A MOD:

[/u][/b]  Because I think sneaking is OP and I want to stack stamina regen on my enchantments so I don't have as many OP enchanted Items.
author: HuntingU MaDDworlD
